title: Architecture
content: Architecture is the art and science of designing buildings and spaces, balancing form and function. Architects create functional, aesthetic, and sustainable environments, shaping how people live, work, and interact.

title: Interior Design
content: Interior design enhances spaces to be healthier and more aesthetic. It involves selecting furniture, colors, and materials to create functional, beautiful environments tailored to clients' needs.

title: Hospitality Design
content: Hospitality design creates welcoming, functional spaces in hotels and restaurants, enhancing guest experiences through aesthetics and practicality for comfort and memorable atmospheres.
